docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/subnets/980190962-one
200
{
  "network": "2.3.4.0",
  "cidr": 24,
  "mask": "255.255.255.0",
  "priority": null,
  "vlanid": "41",
  "gateway": null,
  "dns_primary": null,
  "dns_secondary": null,
  "from": null,
  "to": null,
  "created_at": "2015-12-01T02:40:02Z",
  "updated_at": "2015-12-01T02:40:02Z",
  "ipam": "DHCP",
  "boot_mode": "DHCP",
  "id": 980190962,
  "name": "one",
  "network_address": "2.3.4.0/24",
  "dhcp": {
    "name": "DHCP Proxy",
    "id": 980190962,
    "url": "https://somewhere.net:8443"
  },
  "tftp": {
    "name": "TFTP Proxy",
    "id": 298486374,
    "url": "http://somewhere.else"
  },
  "dns": {

  ],

      "description": null
    }
